adapting the WHO labour Care Guide 
The WHO Labour Care Guide has been developed to align with WHO recommendations on 
intrapartum care for a positive childbirth experience (5). Some adaptations may be needed to 
reflect local conventions (e.g. the use of Hodge planes for classifying fetal descent).
